About This Project

Cheryfield Estate is a beautifully finished Smart Homes. We provide the most affordable luxurious home in Nigeria. Located at the New Ushafa FCDA layout with beautiful serene infrastructure beside Kubwa District, Abuja.

The perfect place to raise children with ample space for children to explore, your home will hold many happy memories. Here, they can discover nature and its wonderful creatures, make new friendships in the play areas or enjoy quality outdoor time with mom and dad.

About This Project

BGC Pinacle Estate is a beautifully finished Smart Homes. We provide the most affordable luxurious home in Nigeria. The estate has salient features like Proper Landscapig for orchard, Good Road Network, Unbeatable Security Patrol System, Lawn Tennis Court, Green Areas, Maximum Parking Spaces, 24/7 CCTV Surveillance, Alternative Power Source, Worship Centres, Street and Public Area Lighting, Shopping Centre, Police Post and Clinic.

items.content_html:
CASABLANCA ESTATE,
Gwarimpa District

  • Type: TERRACE DUPLEX
  • Rooms: 4
  • Status: READY
  • Extras: BQ
  • Price: ₦60M (with flexible payment plan)

About This Project

Casablanca is a beautifully finished Smart Homes, located at Road 35, along 3rd Avenue, Gwarimpa District, Abuja. Don’t miss your chance to live in your next dream home in the heart of Gwarimpa. The living area is airy with a feeling of liberation. Attached, there is a large private terrace running through the entire length of the apartment including a kids playground and private Jacuzzi. Overall, the layout of this residence has been well thought out to include spacious bedrooms, walk in wardrobes and stunning en0suite bathrooms.

The garden is particularly impressive with ample garden in front, side and back, making the house well positioned on the plot. The upstairs offers a living family area, a large master and en suite bedroom as well as two other bedrooms sharing a jack and hill bathroom.

4 BEDROOM TERRACE DUPLEX WITH BQ ₦60M (with flexible payment plan)

items.title: About Us

items.content_html:
About Us

Welcome! We at Bstan Homes Provide
Affordable Housing Solutions for All.

We Provide Personal and Corporate Housing Solutions and making buying and selling of real estate as cost effective as possible while maintaining the highest level of service. We provide accurate and up-to-date information, skilled analysis and sound real estate advice. We continually explore new ideas and technology, to make the selling and buying of real estate faster, less costly, and easier.

At Bstan Homes we are one of the foremost leading real estate and homeowner service company from Africa, always exceeding our customers’ expectations. As we provide the most professional, informative, loyal and dedicated service in the industry. The best interests of our clients will always come first and we will place the clients’ concerns ahead of our own in each and every transaction, as we are dedicated to the development of long-term client relationships! Our team-approach philosophy ensures your needs are important to each and every member of our organization.

Our Core Values

 

  

Professionalism

the competence or skill expected of a professional.

  

Integrity

High standards of honesty and strong moral principles. Doing the right thing all the time with no exemption.

  

Excellence

Commitment in all we do for our internal and external customers. First rate and superior service. Ownership of the outcome.

  

Fearless

the competence or skill expected of a professional.

  

Inspire

To motivate, influence, energize and stimulate the work environment.

  

Innovation

progressive, enlightening forward-thinkers who engaging in new ideas for better solutions and streamlining processes

items.content_html:
BSTAN GARDEN,
City Hilltop (Apo)

  • Type:  DUPLEX, PENT HOUSE, BLOCK OF FLAT
  • Rooms: 2,3,4,5
  • Status: READY
  • Extras: BQ
  • Price: ₦15M - ₦45M (with flexible payment plans)

About This Project

An oasis of greenery set on the hill of Apo, the natural city hill also showcased beautifully as an architectural device that create lines of sight and rhythm across the area. A sanctuary of luxurious tranquility, there are acres of space in the park where residents can easily leave the stresses of city life far behind. Homes set on the estate can literally boast of beautiful greenery of city top views with access of city commerce.

A variety of beautiful, themed areas will appeal to every age and interest whether it’s a relaxing green enclave for family, a place to benefit from some exercise, a buzzing place for tourism, maybe you just want the view and more. Tress and hedges, pathways and trails streams and restful feature throughout.

2 BEDROOMS BLOCK OF FLAT (1000sqm) - HOUSE PRICE: 15 MILLION

3 BEDROOMS BLOCK OF FLAT (1200sqm) - HOUSE PRICE: 18 MILLION
